headline: Prudential Financial Announces Appointment of Vicki Walia as Chief People Officer
summary: NEWARK, N.J., February 11, 2025--Prudential Financial, Inc. (NYSE: PRU) today announced the appointment of Vicki Walia as Chief People Officer, effective March 31, 2025. Walia currently leads human resources for the company’s U.S. Businesses and PGIM, Prudential’s global asset management business.
